A random scenario generator...not a bad idea at all!

Rogue-like games (*band, NetHack, etc..,) all use this.

There's even a random level generator for Doom!

It would make a very interesting project too; you'd have to use lots of nifty algorithms and there would be lots of 
problem solving to be done.

Maybe when I have more time I'll give it a shot :)

-Niall.
